description: The right long sleeve makes for longer adventures. And that's what you get with our Merino-powered Men’s Snowcat Trek Long Sleeve Graphic Tee. Offset shoulder and side seams help maximize comfort, while a flatlock seam construction helps minimize chaffing. And the natural performance of Merino wool handles the rest. So you can stay focused on the journey ahead. Go Far. Feel Good.
name: Smartwool Snowcat Trek LS Graphic Tee - Mens

specs.value: 56% Merino Wool, 44% Recycled Polyester. Exclusive of Decoration
